head.hi: INSTRUCTIONS FOR USING THE PERSON TEMPLATE

body.p:
Please follow these instructions for creating a TEI personography that can be used for conversion in XTriples. All of your work will be done in the listPerson element structure below. Replace placeholder text with your personography information.
To prepare LEAF-Writer environment for creating your personography
In LEAF-Writer toolbar, click "Show tags" button. This will help you to see the secion you are creating.
Activate the "Markup" panel on the left side of screen
Activate the "Raw XML" panel on the right side of screen
Person URI: To provide a URI for person from existing authority source:
Right-click (control-click) on the standard persName element
Choose "Convert to Entity Annotation"; from lookup, choose the authority file that aligns with your research
Birth/Death Information: to add a machine-readable date value:
Right-click (control-click) on the birth/date or death/date element
Replace when="1234" with a date in YYYY-MM-DD format
Sex/Gender URI: To add authority term for sex element
Right-click (control-click) on the sex element
Choose "Edit tag"; for value attribute, type your preferred term; for source attribute, input the URI for a vocabulary that aligns with your research
Note that you will need to replace placeholder text within those attribute fields
Occupation URI: To add authority term for occupation element
Right-click (control-click) on the sex element
Choose "Edit tag"; for source attribute, input the URI for a vocabulary that aligns with your research
Note that you will need to replace placeholder text within those attribute fields
To add additional occupations to a person entry
Go to the Instructions fileÂ https://github.com/LEAF-VRE/LEAF-Writer-samples-and-templates/blob/main/Templates/XTriple_person_instructions.md
Copy code snippet from Occupation section
In LEAF-Writer, at bottom of Raw XML panel click on "Edit Raw XML"
In this window, scroll down to the location of your person entry, and paste the code snippet after the first occupation tag.

persName.name: Forename
Middle or Additional Name - if none, delete
Surname
persName.genName: Generational name (e.g., III, Jr. the Younger - if none, delete)
persName.roleName: offical title or rank (e.g., Dr., Captain, Marchioness - if none, delete)
